definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: Recovering and reconstructing paleoclimatic feature is one of important subjects in Quaternary geological events.
sentences.chinese: 本文就如何重建第四紀古氣候環境問題進行討論。

sentences.english: Pleistocene glaciation caused the extinction of many species.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀冰期，使許多物種絕滅。

sentences.english: In Quaternary, some faults showed a right-handed slipping.
sentences.chinese: 部分斷裂到第四紀表現爲右行走滑。

sentences.english: Through the analysis ofthe grain of the sediment of the Quaternary of Mt.
sentences.chinese: 九華山第四紀“泥礫沉積物”成因有很大爭議。

sentences.english: The origin of the deposit belongs to Quarternary eluvial placer type.
sentences.chinese: 礦牀成因屬第四紀殘積型。

sentences.english: In late Quaternary the lake shallowed and its water became salt-water.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀早期湖深水淡，晚期湖淺水鹹。

sentences.english: Late Quaternary stratigraphy and evolution of the Changjiang Delta, China.
sentences.chinese: 晚第四紀古河口灣的發育及有關的資源環境問題。

sentences.english: Huaxian-Lantian fault is a prequaternary bedrock fault.
sentences.chinese: 華縣一蘭田斷裂爲第四紀前基岩斷裂。

sentences.english: The U-shaped glaciated valley witnesses of the fourth glacial stage in Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 谷口呈U型，是廬山第四紀冰川“漏斗”遺蹟。

sentences.english: There are 10 groups of Quaternary volcano in China.
sentences.chinese: 我國主要的第四紀火山可分爲10羣。

sentences.english: Quaternary slip rate of the middle western segment of the Liangyun fault is quantitavely estimated.
sentences.chinese: 定量估算出兩鄖斷裂中西段第四紀的滑動速率。

sentences.english: Quaternary Lixian sag is northwestern one of the secondary tectonic units of the Dongting basin.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀澧縣凹陷爲洞庭盆地西北部的一個次級凹陷。

sentences.english: The silt in the Yellow River Delta mainly belongs to the quaternary deposits.
sentences.chinese: 黃河三角洲粉土主要爲第四紀散河流堆積物。

sentences.english: The Quaternary glaciation started just a few million years ago – and is still going on.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀始於幾百萬年以前，並延續到現在。

sentences.english: Alluvial sediments are frequently used in Quaternary pollen studies.
sentences.chinese: 沖積物是第四紀孢粉分析經常遇到的研究對象。

sentences.english: Review and prospects of Quaternary Glaciation research in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國第四紀冰川研究的回顧與展望。
